review: I have had the Apple TV a few weeks now.  It was easy to install and has beautiful picture quality.  The problem is I rarely use it because of how long it takes to download a show or movie.  People with faster internet may enjoy more, but with even High Speed DSL internet, I have to plan a few hours in advance for any movie I want to watch.  Just to watch a trailer for a movie takes a few minutes to download.  I haven't tried a Hulu Plus subscription yet, but plan to.  If show can be accessed quicker I will probably enjoy it more.  Perhaps upgrading my internet speed some day will make me enjoy this more.
